post.description: In this example there are 2 fields on data source **name, and phone**

200.description: Return 200 status to indicate that the data was received successfully

dataTypeId.description: A unique identifier (ID) representing the data type id.

hubId.description: A unique identifier (ID) representing the hub associated with this data.

name.description: A string representing the `name` associated with the data.

_id.description: A unique identifier (ID) for this data source.

organizationId.description: A unique identifier (ID) representing the organization associated with this data.

dataId.description: A unique identifier (ID) representing the `data entry ID`.

phone.description: A string representing the `phone` number associated with the data.

createdTime.description: A timestamp indicating the date and time when this data was created.

updatedTime.description: A timestamp indicating the date and time when this data was last updated.

createdBy.description: A string representing the email address or ID of the user who created this data.
